idea-plugin.name: Taiga.io Tasks
idea-plugin.description:
Enable the use of taiga.io as an IntelliJ task server.

IDE JRE version must be 7 or higher for the plugin to load correctly
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.5 - The update task network config now uses the custom URL provided not the default.

1.1.4 - Fixed an issue where missing fields in the API response would cause a NPE to be thrown during json deserialization.

1.1.3 - Increased minimum version identifier to correctly filter out unsupported IDE's
